experience: You both studied at Northern Arizona University
Steve studied at Northern Arizona University before you started
Big Data engagement in Financial and Real-Estate sector.

25+ years of software development experience in the real-estate, public records and financial sector, spanning various technologies, development methodologies and leadership roles.  Developed cutting edge, high concurrency, high volume OLTP systems.  Recent focus has been on SQL database development and performance tuning.  Provide technical leadership for a small team of developers following an "Agile" SW development methodology.  CoreLogic (CLGX) is a spin-off from First American Financial (FAF), which acquired Interealty/MarketLinx/PRC Realty Systems.

summary: - MS Certified Professional: SQL Server. Specializing on metadata driven systems, SQL performance tuning, data modeling, algorithms and high-concurrency OLTP systems. - Strong Object-Oriented-Programming background primarily in C++ and C#. - Vast amount of domain expertise in the real-estate industry and have been involved in the Real Estate Standards Organization since its inception. Served two years on the board of directors of RESO.- Excellent communicator, able to work directly with customers as well as the geekiest of the geeks. - Very capable manager, but prefer to work with the technology and with small highly-skilled teams of developers.Specialties: OLTP system architecture, SQL Server, Data Modeling, DB Performance Tuning,
